author: AAA3A
name: AutoTraceback
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help` to get the list of commands and their description.
It does not use user data.
short: A cog to display the error traceback of a command aomatically after the error!
description: A cog to display the error traceback of a command aomatically after the error! If you are developing cogs for Red for example, you don't need to use the traceback command every time you run a new command.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
